item.title:
拜登总统在特别顾问就拜登卸任期间处理机密文件的情况提出报告后，于周四晚发表了讲话。
他对罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）声称总统不记得他的儿子博-拜登（Beau Biden）何时去世提出异议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden made remarks Thursday night following the special counsel’s report on Biden’s handling of classified documents while out of office.

He took issue with Robert Hur’s claim that the president could not remember when his son, Beau Biden, had died. trib.al/GrlfYZS

item.title: 早在 OceanGate 潜水器在前往泰坦尼克号残骸的途中不幸发生内爆之前，一名前雇员就曾警告公司高管，他们的船体设计和公司的测试方法效率低下。
item.description: Years before an OceanGate submersible tragically imploded on its way to the wreckage of the Titanic, a former employee warned company executives about the inefficiency of their hull design and the company's testing methods. trib.al/yTGZQZe

item.title:
曼哈顿检察官周四宣布，目前已有七人因涉嫌袭击两名纽约市警察而被起诉。
袭击事件发生在 1 月 27 日时代广场附近，当时警察正试图拘留一个人。
item.description:
Seven people have now been indicted in connection with the assault on two New York City police officers, the Manhattan DA announced Thursday.

The assault occurred Jan. 27 near Times Square as officers were trying to take a person into custody.
trib.al/L9YJ3Q2

item.title: 当被问及是否要为 "粗心处理机密材料 "负责时，拜登总统说："我为没有看清我的工作人员在做什么负责"。
item.description: Asked if he takes responsibility for being "careless with classified material," Pres. Biden says: "I take responsibility for not having seen exactly what my staff was doing." abcn.ws/4btHp8x

item.title: 拜登总统谈特别顾问报告"甚至有人说我不记得我儿子是什么时候死的。他怎么敢提这个问题！坦率地说，当我被问到这个问题时，我心想'这不关他们的事'"。
item.description: Pres. Biden on special counsel report: “There’s even reference that I don’t remember when my son died. How in the hell dare he raise that! Frankly, when I was asked the question, I thought to myself, ‘It wasn’t any of their damn business.’” abcn.ws/4btHp8x

item.title:
从第 98 届奥斯卡金像奖开始，选角导演终于可以得到应有的待遇了。
美国电影艺术与科学学院理事会宣布在奥斯卡奖中增设一个新的奖项，以表彰在选角方面取得的成就。
item.description:
Casting directors will finally get their due beginning with the 98th Academy Awards.

The Board of Governors of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced the addition of a new Oscars category for achievement in casting. trib.al/JZyE6eM

item.title: 演员马克-鲁法洛（Mark Ruffalo）因在漫威电影宇宙中饰演布鲁斯-班纳博士（又名绿巨人）而闻名，他还在《狐狸猎手》（Foxcatcher）、《聚焦》（Spotlight）和最近的《可怜的事》（Poor Things）中饰演了奥斯卡提名角色，现在他已经在好莱坞星光大道上拥有了一颗星。
item.description: Actor Mark Ruffalo, known for his role as Dr. Bruce Banner, aka the Hulk, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, as well as Oscar-nominated roles in "Foxcatcher," "Spotlight" and the recent "Poor Things," now has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. trib.al/BwQTEld

item.title:
新消息：湖人队为纪念科比-布莱恩特的新雕像揭幕，该雕像将在洛杉矶体育馆外展出。
瓦妮莎-布莱恩特在雕像揭幕前发表了讲话。
item.description:
NEW: The Lakers have unveiled a new statue honoring Kobe Bryant that will be on display outside Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles.

Vanessa Bryant spoke before the statue was unveiled. abcn.ws/3OxZqtm

item.title: 最新消息：根据维尔京群岛共和党的结果，唐纳德-特朗普将赢得美属维尔京群岛共和党党团会议。
item.description: BREAKING: Donald Trump will win the U.S. Virgin Islands GOP caucus, based on results from the Republican Party of the Virgin Islands. trib.al/760IW1P

item.title: 创纪录的暖冬天气对每年这个时候通常覆盖五大湖的冰层造成了严重影响。
item.description: Record warm winter weather is having severe ramifications on the ice cover that typically engulfs the Great Lakes at this time of year. trib.al/1Zs363k

item.title: 拜登总统谈到了特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）关于其机密文件调查的一份令人震惊的报告，强调了他的案件与前总统特朗普案件的不同之处。
item.description: Pres. Biden addressed a damning report from special counsel Robert Hur on his classified documents probe, highlighting differences between his case and that of former Pres. Trump. trib.al/K8Q7EbF

item.title: 特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）对拜登精神敏锐度和记忆力的评估--被描述为稀疏且明显 "模糊"--为不建议起诉的决定提供了依据。
item.description:
Special counsel Robert Hur's assessment of Biden's mental acuity and power of recall — described as sparse and apparently "hazy" — informed the decision not to recommend charges.

abcnews.go.com/Politics/spec…

item.title:
周四，在国会山举行的长达数小时的委员会听证会上，参议员们就处方药价格问题对三家顶级制药公司的首席执行官进行了质询。
以下是听证会的最大收获：
item.description:
Senators grilled chief executives from three top pharmaceutical companies over prescription drug prices during an hourslong committee hearing Thursday on Capitol Hill.

Here are the biggest takeaways from the hearing: trib.al/MAnfyAl

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）将重点放在非共和党人可以投票的初选州，并将目标锁定在仍然绝大多数支持前总统特朗普的共和党基础选民之外的选民。
item.description: Nikki Haley is focusing on primary states where non-Republicans can vote — and targeting voters outside of a GOP base that still overwhelmingly favors former Pres. Trump. trib.al/qkqWUIR

item.title: 据内罗毕当局称，一名被指控于 2023 年 10 月杀害一名马萨诸塞州妇女并将其尸体留在波士顿机场的谋杀嫌疑人于周三在肯尼亚越狱。
item.description: A murder suspect accused of killing a Massachusetts woman and leaving her body at a Boston airport in Oct. 2023, escaped prison in Kenya Wednesday, according to authorities in Nairobi. trib.al/ZduWp9x

item.title: 一名联邦法官驳回了特朗普前白宫顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）的请求，即在他就藐视国会的定罪提出上诉期间，继续留在监狱外。
item.description:
A federal judge has denied former Trump White House adviser Peter Navarro's request to remain out of prison while he appeals his contempt of Congress conviction.
trib.al/kU2IPWD

item.title: 根据 @ABC 新闻对卫星图像的审查，加沙南部边境城镇拉法的境内流离失所者居住的帐篷数量在过去几周大幅增加。
item.description: The number of tents housing internally displaced people in the southern Gaza border town of Rafah has grown significantly over the past few weeks, according to an @ABC News review of satellite images. trib.al/V44X4kw

item.title: 医学专家说，健身追踪手表和类似设备可能弊大于利，因为它们可能把用户推向极端。
item.description: Medical experts say that fitness-tracking watches and similar devices can do more harm than good as they may push a user to extreme levels. trib.al/qrhTEHW

item.title: 辛迪-劳珀（Cyndi Lauper）的儿子、说唱歌手德克林-劳珀（Declyn "Dex" Lauper）因藏有枪支于周三晚在哈莱姆区发生枪击案后被警方逮捕。
item.description: Declyn "Dex" Lauper, the rapper son of Cyndi Lauper, was arrested for gun possession Wednesday night after police responded to a shooting in Harlem. trib.al/YO10bKw

item.title: 新消息：拜登总统在特别顾问关于机密文件的报告发布后发表讲话。
item.description: NEW: Pres. Biden is speaking out after a special counsel report on classified documents is released. trib.al/HEAy32H

item.title: R to @ABC：特朗普的律师辩称："......即使候选人是公认的叛乱分子，第 3 条仍然允许候选人竞选公职，甚至赢得公职选举......"
item.description: Trump's lawyer argued: "...Even if a candidate is an admitted insurrectionist, Section 3 still allows the candidate to run for office and even win election to office..."

item.title: R to @ABC：凯坦吉-布朗-杰克逊（Ketanji Brown Jackson）法官向特朗普的律师乔纳森-米切尔（Jonathan Mitchell）询问科罗拉多州最高法院关于特朗普支持者在 1 月 6 日试图暴力阻止选举计票的行为是否符合第 3 条规定的 "叛乱 "的认定。
item.description: Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson pressed Trump's attorney, Jonathan Mitchell, on the Colorado Supreme Court's finding that the violent attempts by Trump supporters to halt the electoral count on Jan. 6 qualified as an "insurrection" under Section 3.

item.title:
美国最高法院周四审理了一起具有历史意义的案件，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）因在2021年1月6日国会大厦袭击事件中所扮演的角色而再次任职的能力受到质疑。
关注实时更新：
item.description:
The U.S. Supreme Court on Thursday heard a historic case challenging Donald Trump's ability to hold office again over his role in the Capitol attack on Jan. 6, 2021.

Follow live updates: trib.al/pyNbVXz

item.title:
佐治亚州克莱顿县法医办公室裁定，一名在出生时被斩首的新生儿死于他杀。
律师称，据称医院工作人员试图向婴儿父母隐瞒斩首事件。
阅读更多
item.description:
The death of a newborn baby who had been decapitated during birth was ruled a homicide by the Clayton County, Georgia Medical Examiner’s Office.

Lawyers claim the hospital staff allegedly attempted to hide the decapitation from the parents.

Read more: trib.al/CD2BkkD

item.title: 孟加拉国外交部长周四表示，在与一支少数民族军队的战斗中，约有340名缅甸边防警察和士兵逃入孟加拉国。
item.description: About 340 members of Myanmar's Border Guard Police and soldiers have fled into Bangladesh during fighting with an ethnic minority army, Bangladesh's foreign minister said Thursday. trib.al/T2I6wrE

item.title: 在匈牙利总统被揭露赦免了一名在儿童性虐待案中被判为共犯的男子之后，要求她辞职的压力越来越大。
item.description: Pressure is mounting on Hungary's president to resign after it was revealed that she issued a pardon to a man convicted as an accomplice in a child sexual abuse case. trib.al/ilYYUet

item.title: 周四上午，两架捷蓝航空公司的飞机在波士顿洛根国际机场的除冰垫上相撞。
item.description: Two JetBlue planes clipped each other Thursday morning while on a de-icing pad at Boston Logan International Airport. trib.al/drLMbed

item.title: 熔岩流到通往冰岛格林达维克附近著名旅游景点 "蓝湖 "的道路上。
item.description: 📸 Molten lava flows onto the road leading to the famous tourist destination "Blue Lagoon" near Grindavik, Iceland. trib.al/kGywKRd

item.title: 两名正在度假的妇女称，她们在巴哈马的嘉年华邮轮度假期间一起被下药并遭到殴打。
item.description: Two women on a vacation say they were drugged and assaulted in the Bahamas during a Carnival cruise vacation together. trib.al/DQGjDwg

item.title: 周四上午，两架捷蓝航空公司的飞机在波士顿洛根国际机场的除冰垫上相撞。
item.description: Two JetBlue planes clipped each other Thursday morning while on a de-icing pad at Boston Logan International Airport. trib.al/yjmgNf0
